item.title: Eric Andrieu, lawyer, Péchenard & Associés
item.description: From: Eric Andrieu (Péchenard & Associés law firm) To: Vincent B. Le Corre On October 27, 2015, I received an email from McDonald’s France lawyer Éric Andrieu of the Péchenard & Associés law firm. https://archive20210730.auxjournalistes.com/docs/emails/McDonaldsReceivedFrom/2015-10-27-16h00-Eric_Andrieu_Avocat_McDonalds_France_Redacted.pdf The lawyer commits an exceptionally serious mistake (legal malpractice) by confirming “to [his] clients that the sweepstakes [note: actually a serious fraud] was in compliance with French and European law.” This is obviously false. Either he is dangerously incompetent, or he is complicit.
